column4: I have a question about drivers? Is that the right term? Or kernel modules? It has been a while since i did research into the basics of linux. Anywho, I have a wireless xbox 360 controller, and a hacked reciever from an xbox 360. I was wondering if anybody knew how to get it working in ubuntu off the top of their head
Ah, thanks. I was looking at that but it seemed to be outdated information, wanted to get a third parties opinion on the matter ^^
Thanks again, i have to rtfm more often ^^
